name: Twitter improved
description:
- Reduces timeline pictures
- Hides all feed content published on twitter from users you do not follow (i.e., tweets other followed users liked, and "you might also like")
additional_info:
Hides:
-Tweets from users u do not follow 
- Who to follow module on sidebar
- Retweets / sponsored (I think!)
- Hides "translate to (your language)"
-Hides right sidebar (wider timeline)

Reduced pictures on timeline.

Adds:
- Green circle around your avatar to indicate this script is running.

LastVersion:
- Fixed bug clearing entire timeline in a non followed user profiles + trends
